let rec additivePersistence n = 
let c=0 in
let rec break(num,count)=
if num>9 then
break(sumList(digitsOfInt(num)),(count+1))
else
count

let rec digitsOfInt n = 
if n<=0 then[]
else let rec loop n a =
if n=0 then a
else loop(n/10)(n mod 10::a)in
match n with
|0->[0]
|_->loop n[]
